skins.shipDescription: Akizuki-class destroyer number three C Suzutsuki.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Suzutsuki, Akizuki-class destroyer. I was a member of the 61st DesDiv along with Akizuki and Hatsuzuki, and escorted Musashi and participated in Noshiro's rescue mission! Not a shabby record, right? I had a close call at the Battle of Bou-no-Misaki when I got hit by two torpedoes, but I managed to survive until the end!
skins.acquisition: Ahaha, Pooky, listen up, we're gonna live here from now on! Uhh... Third ship of the Akizuki-class, Suzutsuki, reporting in! I'll be the one to protect my comrades and you, Commander! Just kidding~?
skins.login: Welcome back! ...Got any new jobs? I'm down for anything!
skins.details: When my friends are counting on me, I can feel power surging within me that makes me feel like I can do anything!
skins.secretaryIdle1: "The invincible Suzutsuki is here! Your attacks shall not put a scratch on me!" How'd that sound? Hya hah!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ahaha! You'd rather sit atop Commander's head instead of mine? Very well, go forth! Oh, but no pranks though!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, you sure have a lot of work, don't you~ Look, Isokaze, Urakaze, being a warlord or a general is a lot of hard work. A better job would be to become Commander's retainers!
skins.secretaryTouch: This marking on my right cheek? You haven't heard of it, Commander? It's the latest fashion trend! Here, I'll draw one on for you!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: C-Commander! Jeez, there are some things that you shouldn't be doing!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Look, fluffy and super pattable, right? ...Hey, I'm talking about Pooky, not my ears!

skins.JPClientName: 鲈隆浜xにてお相手致す！
skins.shipDescription: Commander, over here! We're about to start without you! Ahaha, what would you like to do, Commander? Beach volleyball? Sandcastle building? We can also go relax in the water if you'd like!
skins.acquisition: Commander, over here! We're about to start without you! Ahaha, what would you like to do, Commander? Beach volleyball? Sandcastle building? We can also go relax in the water if you'd like!
skins.login: Commander, time out! Look, the others have already started playing without you~ Fine, fine... I shall be the one to accompany you then!
skins.details: I'm pretty refreshing and cool, right? Just like my name suggests~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Do we have enough people to build a sand castle? Great, count me in as well! Wait, Commander, hold on!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Pooky likes coming to the sea as well, isn't that right~? Ah, careful not to fall into the water!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Agano's not here? That's too bad, I was looking forward to playing with her... Commander, why do you look so relieved? Hm? It's just my imagination?
skins.secretaryTouch: Woah?! ...Oh, it's you, Commander, you surprised me... Hibiki shoved a crab in my face earlier and it gave me a nasty pinch...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Jeez, Commander! What are you doing in front of this many people?!

skins.JPClientName: 鲈隆⒂鸶つきにてお相手いたす！
skins.shipDescription: I, Akizuki-class destroyer, Suzutsuki, shall not allow you to pass through these arches! Hwuh?! I missed the return again...!
skins.acquisition: I, Akizuki-class destroyer, Suzutsuki, shall not allow you to pass through these arches! Hwuh?! I missed the return again...!
skins.details: These markings are the proof of my battle scars as a warrior... they're not just doodles! Ugh... I swear, I'll be back for revenge after I train some more!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Aaahhhhh!! Jean Bart, you don't have to shank every shuttlecock out of existence!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Pooky, I got some sunflower seeds from Hanazuki! Here, come and eat your fill~ Grow big and strong and scare the heck out of the commander~ Ahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I can't sit still during t
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, make sure the matches continue smoothly!
